mapper.select: SELECT *, ABS(NOW() - h.bjjzrq) AS diffTime FROM hjqcb h where h.UnitInfoAccount=#{unitinfoaccount} ORDER BY h.hjbh desc LIMIT 0,1
select uc.*,uf.* from Unitsaccount uc join UnitInfo uf on uc.UnitInfoAccount=uf.UnitInfoAccount where uc.UnitInfoAccount=#{unitinfoaccount}

select count(*) from hjqcb h join unitsaccount uc on h.UnitInfoAccount=uc.UnitInfoAccount join UnitInfo uf on uc.UnitInfoId=uf.UnitInfoId join sys_user us on h.userId=us.userId
and uf.UnitInfoName like "%"#{UnitInfoName}"%"
and h.hjywlx like "%"#{bjywllx}"%"
and h.bjjzrq between #{date1} and #{date2}
order by hjbh desc
mapper.sql: hjbh, UnitInfoAccount, grzhbhs, userId, gjind, jnmy, nhyf, bjjzrq, bczjrs, bczjje, bcjsrs, bcjsje, scjnrs, scjnje, bchnrs, bchnje, ssje, jedxzh, bjjkfs, bjjkzt, rzrq, hjywlx, hjbz
mapper.insert: insert into hjqcb (UnitInfoAccount, userId, gjind, jnmy, nhyf, bjjzrq, bczjrs, bczjje, bcjsrs, bcjsje, scjnrs, scjnje, bchnrs, bchnje, ssje, jedxzh, bjjkfs, bjjkzt, rzrq, hjywlx, hjbz) values (#{unitinfoaccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gjind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jnmy,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nhyf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bjjzrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bczjrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bczjje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bcjsrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bcjsje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scjnrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scjnje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bchnrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bchnje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ssje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{jedxzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjjkfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjjkzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rzrq,jdbcType=DATE},#{hjywlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{hjbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update hjqcb
UnitInfoAccount = #{unitinfoaccount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
grzhbhs = #{grzhbhs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gjind = #{gjind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jnmy = #{jnmy,jdbcType=DATE},
nhyf = #{nhyf,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bjjzrq = #{bjjzrq,jdbcType=DATE},
bczjrs = #{bczjrs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bczjje = #{bczjje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bcjsrs = #{bcjsrs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bcjsje = #{bcjsje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
scjnrs = #{scjnrs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
scjnje = #{scjnje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bchnrs = #{bchnrs,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bchnje = #{bchnje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ssje = #{ssje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
jedxzh = #{jedxzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bjjkfs = #{bjjkfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bjjkzt = #{bjjkzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rzrq = #{rzrq,jdbcType=DATE},
hjywlx = #{hjywlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hjbz = #{hjbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where hjbh = #{hjbh,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hjqcb set UnitInfoAccount = #{unitinfoaccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grzhbhs = #{grzhbhs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gjind = #{gjind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jnmy = #{jnmy,jdbcType=DATE}, nhyf = #{nhyf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bjjzrq = #{bjjzrq,jdbcType=DATE}, bczjrs = #{bczjrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bczjje = #{bczjje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bcjsrs = #{bcjsrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bcjsje = #{bcjsje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, scjnrs = #{scjnrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scjnje = #{scjnje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bchnrs = #{bchnrs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bchnje = #{bchnje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ssje = #{ssje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, jedxzh = #{jedxzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bjjkfs = #{bjjkfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bjjkzt = #{bjjkzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rzrq = #{rzrq,jdbcType=DATE}, hjywlx = #{hjywlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hjbz = #{hjbz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where hjbh = #{hjbh,jdbcType=INTEGER}
